summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Office of Management and Planning, authorizing the Director of the Office of Management and Planning to apply to the United States Department of Transportation for a grant to support the environmental review of the South Lake Union Plan; authorizing acceptance of funds; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1995 budget of the Office of Management and Planning; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund therefor, all by a Three-fourths vote of the City Council.
